title: Body-protected electrical areas
fullText:
A final sub-circuit used to supply LPD-protected socket-outlets in a body-protected electrical area shall not be used to supply electrical points in another room.
Exceptions:
1	Final sub-circuits supplying socket-outlets in the body protected area may be used to supply the adjoining ensuite LPD.
2	Final sub-circuits supplying socket-outlets identified 'CLEANING PURPOSES ONLY' in accordance with Clause 2.7.3.
NOTE: See Section 6 for sub-circuit requirements for alterations, additions and repairs.
